articles.title: Trump's first 100 days and the rapid remaking of a nation - BBC
articles.description: The impact of what President Trump has done so far is being felt in every corner of American life.
articles.content:
Anthony Zurcher and Tom Geoghegan
During last year's presidential campaign, Donald Trump constantly repeated his intention to bring about dramatic change as soon as he returned to the White House.
… [+16734 chars]
